EventDescription: Festival where we discuss our religion, and participate in activities very close to our cultures. Join us in this two-day event where you can volunteer, get free delicious vegetarian food, dance, and watch mind-blowing performances.

Festival where we discuss our religion, and participate in activities very close to our cultures. Join us in this two-day event where you can volunteer, get free delicious vegetarian food, dance, and watch mind-blowing performances.
Join us at out temple to celebrate in our Boat Festival as we dance, eat delicious food, and honor Krishna
Join us at Seattle College where we serve free, vegetarian food to the homeless from our food truck
